Title: Family, Friends, and Fools
Text: Your Product must start with a DESIGN feature.
Funny text: They believed in you because you struck them with you vision. That is, you visually struck them.

Title: Legacy Pet Project
Text: Your product starts with a random Feature that has twice as many Tickets it should have based on its Score Points.
Funny text: Let's not even start with all that cobweb...

Title: Beta Test
Text: Put 5 counters on up to 3 TECH tickets.

Title: Demo Version
Text: If you have a Feature in your hand, you can place it right now. Put half the required number of Tickets on it (rounding down).

Title: Release 1.0
Text: Bugs overwhelm you. Put 1 Ticket on each of 3 most expensive Features.
